name: Chicken Stuffed Baked Avocados
author: Destiny0173
summary: This is a recipe that I hope gets passed down. Everyone seems to like it. We make it as a main dish when I make it with chicken. We also make it a side when omitting the chicken. We will then have grilled chicken with it.
ingredients: ½ cup shredded Parmesan cheese, or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Scoop out some of the flesh in the center of each avocado; place into mixing bowl
Add chicken, cream cheese, tomatoes, salt, pepper, and cayenne pepper; mix well to combine
Scoop spoonfuls of chicken mixture into the wells of each avocado; top each with generous amount of Parmesan cheese
Place avocado halves, face-up, in  muffin cups to stabilize
Bake avocados in preheated oven until cheese is melted, 8 to 10 minutes
